name: Channel 3
description:
It's about a kid name tobias who has a bit of a day.

Controls
[W] [S] [A] [D] = Movement
[SPACE] [ENTER] [Z] = Interact
[C] [X] = Menu

It's a lot of stupid that's what it is.

I literally made this in 3 days.

It's honestly mostly a shitpost for fun, so I hope you enjoy.
